meanings.sent1: This jacket is the hoodiest one in the store.
meanings.sent2: She always wears the hoodiest clothes to stay warm.
meanings.sent3: The hoodiest sweater made her look like a cozy bear.
meanings.sent4: His love for comfort made him choose the hoodiest option available.
meanings.sent5: The hoodiest blanket kept her warm on chilly nights.

meanings.sent1: That hoodie is the hoodiest I've ever seen!
meanings.sent2: She won the contest for wearing the hoodiest hoodie.
meanings.sent3: The hoodiest hoodie in the world was too big for the tiny dog.
meanings.sent4: His collection of hoodies was the hoodiest in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The hoodiest hoodie kept him warm during the snowstorm.
